text: This outlet is rather compact, but I (and everyone who entered) was greeted by the friendly staff (in a guardian orange T-shirt) and asked if she could be of assistance. She is also attentive to the customers.  How could I not buy something from here....

The opening hours should be start at 8:00 , I planned to collect my online order this morning, but it was not open and I’ve waited for 30 minutes,I don’t know when it will be open. I saw several customers trying to enter the store but the door was locked. The store should publish their real opening hours !
Needed urgent medication but store is still not open at 8.15am while advertise online 8am . This is unacceptable . And dangerous
Excuse me? What's this claptrap? Sign says open, Google says open at 8am, there's a worker at the counter but the door is locked. Plus your worker looks like she's on her phone. 6 April 2024 at 8am
Great service received by a male cashier on 7 Sep! He seemed like the only staff on duty but did a great job manning the counter + helping us out as we needed some help finding an item.
